entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow or rain near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
